message.body: I know it's short notice and we just met up the other day, but are you free for lunch today?
Something up? I could make it, but not until 12:15.
12:15 is ok. I'm ready to blow a gasket is what's up. I will try not to make it an all-rant lunch, though
Great. 12:15. Meet at the center!? Keep gaskets intact until then!
